# README

Run make equivalent and see the result as vignette

```{r}
targets::tar_make()
browseURL("_output/vignettes/01_simple_brms.html")
```

## if you using quarto, rememebrt to check if there any `_quarto.yml` a level above, interfering with your project


# Targets

Print the steps into the console
```{r}
tar_manifest(fields = command)
```

And visualise the analysis
```{r}
tar_visnetwork()
```
